quote: Loving someone who doesn't love you back is like hugging a cactus, The tighter you hold on the more it's going to hurt.
author: Anonymous

quote: Forgive your loved ones to free yourself from resentment. Forgive your enemies to free yourself from hatred. Forgive yourself to free yourself from guilt.
author: Anonymous

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: You become what you believe.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Investing in yourself is the best investment you will ever make. It will not only improve your life, it will improve the lives of all those around you.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: You are your only limit.
author: Anonymous

quote: The more you know yourself, the more clarity there is. Self-knowledge has no end.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The biggest room in the world is the room for improvement.
author: Helmut Schmidt

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: Anytime you start to miss her and want to text her remember that there's a guy on her phone who doesn't have to text her first.
author: Anonymous

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The biggest room in the world is the room for improvement.
author: Helmut Schmidt

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: Anytime you start to miss her and want to text her remember that there's a guy on the phone who doesn't have to text her first.
author: Anonymous

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We cannot become what we want by remaining what we are.
author: Max DePree

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
author: Anonymous

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Plutarch

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Personal development is the belief that you are worth the effort, time, and energy needed to develop yourself.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Income seldom exceeds personal development.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
author: Matty Mullins

quote: Unless you change how you are, you will always have what you’ve got.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The willpower to mediate between your current self and your future self is where growth happens.
author: Anonymous

quote: Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Self-complacency is fatal to any self-improvement.
author: Margaret Sangster

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: One can choose to go back toward safety or forward toward growth.
author: Abraham Maslow

quote: You are essentially who you create yourself to be and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Wisdom is knowing what to do next; virtue is doing it.
author: David Starr Jordan

quote: Improvement begins with I.
author: Anonymous

quote: Your life only gets better when you do. Work on yourself and the rest will follow.
author: Anonymous

quote: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
author: Brian Herbert

quote: Change is inevitable. Growth is optional.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Character is simply habit long continued.
author: Plutarch

quote: The standard you walk past is the standard you accept.
author: David Morrison

quote: Don't go through life, grow through life.
author: Eric Butterworth

quote: Absorb what is useful, discard what is useless and add what is specifically your own.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly; be afraid only of standing still.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: The man who views the world at 50 the same as he did at 20 has wasted 30 years of his life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Empty your cup so that it may be filled; become devoid to gain totality.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Everything you want is out there waiting for you to do it. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
author: Jules Renard

quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
author: Judy Garland

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: The long run is just a collection of short runs.
author: Anonymous

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Your habits will determine your future.
author: Jack Canfield

quote: Transformation is a process, and as life happens there are tons of ups and downs.
author: Rick Warren

quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: You cannot dream yourself into a character; you must hammer and forge yourself one.
author: James A. Froude

quote: Small, daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: If we all did the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The greatest gift you can give to somebody is your own personal development.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Identify your problems, but give your power and energy to solutions.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
